name: Words on Stream
storyline: By promoting an environment in which the streamer and the audience play and compete on an equal basis, WOS revolutionize streaming games by breaking the limits.
summary:
WOS is an interactive game for streamers that can be played with the audience through Twitch chat!
Players challenge themselves to form words from mixed letters that are displayed on the screen.

videos.title: Words On Stream | Interactive game for streamers
